input.sentences: he was a little shy when he saw us .
this is the cat we originally raised .
he is very comfortable on the sofa .
lastly | he enjoyed having a friend that accompanied him .
output.sentences: I've always said cats shouldn't be trusted, but I adopted one anyways.
They believed her to be shy, but I saw her as lethal.
She raised her head from my lap, and looked at me, plotting my demise.
She casually made herself comfortable anywhere, from the kitchen counter to the couch.
I have friends, but I keep my enemies closer.
